| colspan="2" | Test 1 (Both the columns are merged)
|-

|}

Test 3 (The width of this column is 70%)

rules.name: Icons
rules.description: Insert icons from uploaded files.
steps: Save the relevant icon in a folder.
Ensure you have one folder where you can save all your icons so that in case you need that same icon in future, you know where to look for it.
Check if you need to crop the icon.
Ensure all your icons are mostly of the same size.
Put the following format exactly wherever you want to put the icon: '''(''' [[File:<type the name of the icon with which you have saved>.png]] ''')'''
Click Edit on the upper-right of the page and then again click Save Changes in case the icon is not getting reflected.
examples: Click Add a New Code Package icon '''(''' [[File:Download Report Icon.png]] ''')''' next to PythonScript.
Click '''(''' [[File:Download Report Icon.png]] ''')''' next to PythonScript.

rules.name: Images
rules.description: Insert images from uploaded files.
steps: Save the relevant image in a folder.
Ensure you have one folder where you can save all your images.
Check if you need to crop the image.
Ensure all your images are mostly of the same size.
Put the following format exactly wherever you want to put the image: {| class="wikitable" |[[File:<type the name of the image with which you have saved>.png|frame|left]] |}
Click Edit on the upper-right of the page and then again click Save Changes in case the image is not getting reflected.
examples: {| class="wikitable" |[[File:Re enter the Same Value in Editable Measure1.jpg|1000px|left]] |}
